ygData.subject: Re: Mysterious Weapon ***spoiler***
ygData.msgSnippet: Space, the final frontier * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * Aye, I ve seen the spirit of which you speak, haunting the basement at unrest.  Harder to
ygData.messageBody:
Space, the final frontier
*

*
*

*

Aye, I've seen the spirit of which you speak, haunting
the basement at unrest. Harder to find than to kill.
I was but 20 when my party felled him. And a nasty
speed looting dwarf with us charged on the corpse, yet
it did not dissapear. After he turned I myself looted
and look at what appeared to be a rusty dagger, but,
but, (big evil laugh ahead) NOW I HAVE THE
DAGGER!!!!!!! MWAAAAHHAHAHAHHAHHAHA

Actually, gave it to a rouge friend, not a lot of good
piercing weapons out there.

Nothing soothes like a big evil laugh
Llewrend Lynnhaven
